channel.title: No idea
channel.description:
Hey there every1! Im stucked with my error, i didnt remember exactly what i did but i didnt do anything major what could cause that error. [code]Buildfile: build.xml
runserver: [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc.<init>(Npc.java:77) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadWorld(WorldLoader.jav a:51) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.getWorld(World.java:85) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:29) [java] java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError [java] Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.cout(GUI.java:1495) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.Logger.error(Logger.java:31) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.getWorld(World.java:89) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:29) [java] Could not find the main class: org.rscdaemon.server.Server. Program will exit. [java] Exception in thread "main" [java] Java Result: 1
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 49 seconds Press any key to continue . . . [/code] Server is compiling but when i try to run it, i m getting this error and i have no idea what is causing it... Maybe some1 smart could point me to right direction or could say what i have done wrong :confused:
Thanks!

item.title: No idea
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

[code] setBusy(false);
timeout.stop();
timeout = null;
}

public Npc(NPCLoc loc) {
	def = EntityHandler.getNpcDef(loc.getId());
	curHits = def.getHits();
	this.loc = loc;
	super.setID(loc.getId());
	super.setLocation(Point.location(loc.startX(), loc.startY()), true);
	super.setCombatLevel(Formulae.getCombatLevel(def.getAtt(), def.getDef(), def.getStr(), def.getHits(), 0, 0, 0));
}

public Npc(int id, int startX, int startY, int minX, int maxX, int minY, int maxY) {
	this(new NPCLoc(id, startX, startY, minX, maxX, minY, maxY));
}

public void remove() {
	if(!removed && shouldRespawn && def.respawnTime() > 0) {
		world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new DelayedEvent(null, def.respawnTime() * 1000) {[/code]

Here it is…I think i found my mistake, its on Npcloc.xml but still cant find that right place where i did mistake …
